key_features: Power adapter and Ethernet cable included; back panel with ventilation slots and labels indicating model and SSID information
description: The images collectively depict a FRITZ!Box 7590 AX v2 router in varying conditions. The main body is white with red accents, while the back panel is silver. The device includes accessories like a power adapter and Ethernet cable, and the back panel shows ventilation slots and labels with model and SSID information.
